articles.description: The annual award is given to a top-tier player in Europe under the age of 21 for their performances over a calendar year, with Elliott, Carvalho, Elanga and Diallo among 10 to make the cut.
articles.content:
Liverpool pair Harvey Elliott and Fabio Carvalho are among the most eye-catching names on the Golden Boy 2022 shortlist.

articles.author: Oli Gamp
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton says Sky Sports F1 pundit Naomi Schiff is 'totally qualified' after abuse from trolls - Daily Mail
articles.description: Schiff has competed in racing events since 2010 and recently became a diversity and inclusion ambassador for the all-female W-series before being offered a punditry role on Sky Sports.
articles.content:
Lewis Hamilton has come out in defence of Sky Sports F1 pundit Naomi Schiff after the former racer received abuse following her coverage at the Azerbaijan Grand Prix.
